name: Synthropic
description:
For my first ever game jam, I present to you Synthropic. What is Synthropic? It is a simple yet challenging game in which you drive through the horizon to get as far as possible. I made sure to make the game fully compatible with gamepads!

Figure out which item is a buff an active or a debuff and try to make it as far as you possibly can by avoiding obstacles on the road. The longer you are on the road the faster you'll go, get ready to test your reaction time

I will be adding this game to steam and will continue to work on it in my free time.
